name: Pong Xtreme 4000 Ultimate Definitive Edition
description:
• This project was made to showcase my sound design and game audio implementation abilities. All audio in this game is created by me.
  • I used Thomas Brush's Pong 2.5D Kit as a template for the game design, changing and adding things along the way as needed for the audio implementation.
  • I used Ableton, Pro Tools and Reaper to record and create all sound effects, dialogue and music. 
  • I used Unity and FMOD for the game creation and implementation.
  • To exit the game, press the windows key, then close the game from your taskbar.

Please enjoy possibly the greatest game ever created...
